en.Optional. Required when Gateway auth is: Optional. Required when Gateway auth is enabled.
en.Agent id used to build request route (op: Agent id used to build request route (openclaw:<agent>) and x-openclaw-agent-id.
en.Comma-separated agent IDs for the dropdo: Comma-separated agent IDs for the dropdown (example: main,research,fast).
en.Use {{openclaw_prompt=message|thread|age: Use {{openclaw_prompt=message|thread|agent}} to return a response from OpenClaw.
en.Use {{openclaw_one_line=message|thread|a: Use {{openclaw_one_line=message|thread|agent}} to return a single-line response.
en.Use {{openclaw_prompt_clear=thread_name}: Use {{openclaw_prompt_clear=thread_name}} to clear a conversation thread.
